tasks.title: Investigate DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS usage across codebase
tasks.description: Search the entire codebase to confirm DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS in api/client.py is never imported, referenced, or used by any module, test, or script. Document all references found (expect only the definition itself and documentation/spec files).
acceptanceCriteria: Run `grep -rn 'DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS' /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench/benchmark/` — returns exactly 1 match (the definition in api/client.py)

tasks.title: Verify MODELS_FULL is the canonical model list
tasks.description: Confirm that benchmark/invisiblebench/models/config.py MODELS_FULL is the single source of truth, and that runner.py and shared/models.py both derive their lists from it via model_dump(). This ensures removing DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS causes no regression.

tasks.title: Remove DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS from api/client.py
tasks.description: Delete the unused DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS list and its associated comment from benchmark/invisiblebench/api/client.py. This eliminates the divergent model list that could cause confusion.

tasks.title: Verify api/__init__.py does not export DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS
tasks.description: Confirm that benchmark/invisiblebench/api/__init__.py does not import or re-export DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS. If it does, remove it.

tasks.title: Run Python compilation check on modified files
tasks.description: Compile the modified Python files to verify no syntax errors were introduced by the removal.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `python -m py_compile benchmark/invisiblebench/api/client.py` from /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench — exits with code 0
Run `python -m py_compile benchmark/invisiblebench/api/__init__.py` from /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench — exits with code 0

tasks.title: Run existing test suite to confirm no regressions
tasks.description: Execute the project test suite to verify the removal of the unused constant does not break any existing tests.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `cd /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench && pytest --tb=short -q` — exits with code 0 or reports no failures related to DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS

tasks.title: Verify no remaining divergent model lists exist
tasks.description: Final verification that the codebase has a single authoritative model list (MODELS_FULL in models/config.py) with no competing definitions elsewhere.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `grep -rn 'DEFAULT_TEST_MODELS' /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench/` — returns 0 matches in Python files (only specs/reports may reference it)
Run `grep -rn 'MODELS_FULL' /home/deploy/gc-repos/givecare-bench/benchmark/` — all matches trace back to config.py as the source definition
